page.title: 15Recreation ; Papa Westray
page.content: A Youth Club meets every Friday night and during the Spring, they hold snooker, table tennis and darts competitions. Also there are branches of the SWRI and Womens Guild which meet periodically. St Tredwell Model Yacht club have a regatta during the summer where the members compete for the George Rendall memorial cup. The Thursday Club,for the elderly, is run by the nurse. It meets weekly in the school once a month they have a school lunch. At harvest time a Muckle Supper of local mutton and clapshot is held. An inter-island sports is held on one of the North Isles each year.In 1985 Papa Westray won this competition for the first time.
